messages.messageBody:
Hi Kimberly. Here are some links that may be helpful.

Work from Home
http://www.ivillage.com/topics/work/0,,165441,00.html

Working and Single Parents who Homeschool
http://homeschooling.gomilpitas.com/weblinks/working.htm

Tips for Frugal Living
http://frugalliving.about.com/
http://forums.delphiforums.com/frugality

Crystal

messages.subject: Intro & question
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I d like to introduce myself.  I m Kim Griffin, mother of 2 beautiful = children (dd is 4 and ds is 2).  I ve been reading this list and = unschooling.com
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I'd like to introduce myself. I'm Kim Griffin, mother of 2 beautiful =
children (dd is 4 and ds is 2). I've been reading this list and =
unschooling.com for a long while now and am definitely headed down the =
unschooling path. You all seem like a wonderful bunch and I have =
learned from you all...so, thank you.

Now for my question.. I may be a single mother soon; however, I still =
want to stay home with my children. Do any of you out there work from =
home? If so, what do you do and do you have any suggestions?

I appreciate your help...Thanks : )

Kimberly Griffin
